abstract: John Paynter is coming out of retirement to join the boutique investment bank Greenhill & Company as a senior adviser. Mr. Paynter, the former vice chairman of JPMorgan Cazenove, is well known among institutional investors in Britain and can help Greenhill expand its advisory work there.
lead_paragraph: John Paynter is coming out of retirement to join the boutique investment bank Greenhill & Company as a senior adviser. Mr. Paynter, the former vice chairman of JPMorgan Cazenove, is well known among institutional investors in Britain and can help Greenhill expand its advisory work there.
